name: Civilization (itch) (Indie Eclipse)
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam 40 A Competitive Game Jam.

This game was create for a long time giving me a headache and exhaustion.

Now briefly about the game:

You play as a person who civilized (Control) a cubic word. You have to earn enough money to place objects and stuff.

Future Updates :

- DISEASE

- POPULATION COUNT
